slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dragon Tiger Wild arrives with the latest WILD CARD bonus! Get a bigger chance to win up to 127x!
Simply guess the highest card and the wild card for even bigger prizes! LET'S GET WILD!!!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: This game is played with 3 cards. The 2 main cards (Dragon and Tiger) compete to see which side has the highest value. 1 wild card is drawn to form a Wild Bonus combination.
You can bet on the Main Bets: Dragon/Tiger, or on Wild Bet combinations: Dragon Wild, Dragon Pair, or Tiger Wild, Tiger Pair, and Super Wild.

slide-3.title: Wild Bonus
content: The wild card appears to form bonus combinations that can drastically increase your winnings up to 127x!
Bet on wild combinations and seize the chance for MULTIPLE WILD BONUSES!
